According to National Highway Traffic Safety Administration data compiled by Avvos Naked Law blog Interstate  running through Montana is the most dangerous road in the country based on drunk driving fatalities PERIOD

Roads in Montana Wyoming and New Mexico lead the list with over fourandahalf alcoholrelated deaths per  residents from  to  PERIOD Montana led with . deaths compared to secondplace Wyomings Interstate  with five deaths PERIOD

The report said interstates had the most fatal alcoholrelated deaths and rural interstates led the list.Rural drivers are more likely to beunder the influence of additional drugs and drive drunkdespite DUI convictions according to the report PERIOD

Rural areas also have less access to public transportation especially late at night and outside of city limits PERIOD Though Montana holds the top spot Wyoming appears in the top ten most dangerous highways three separate times for Interstates   and  PERIOD

The average blood alcohol content of drivers involved in fatal wrecks along I90 in Montana was . almost three times the legal limit PERIOD It ranks fairly low on the list far behind the leader McDowell Road in Arizona with a . average blood alcohol content PERIOD

The problem with these statistics Col PERIOD Tom Butler of the Montana Highway Patrol said is that they dont take into account tourists that create a traffic population that is proportionately higher than Montanas true population PERIOD

The interstate system is our safest route of transportation in Montana Butler said PERIOD

Butler said alcoholrelated accidents went down from  last year at this time to  this year PERIOD He added that more accidents occur on rural roads and highways due to steep roadside ditches and small or nonexistent shoulders PERIOD

Butler said theres a societal responsibility for Montanans to plan ahead when they know theyll be drinking but many people push the issue PERIOD

Alcohol is ingrained in the fabric of Montana he said PERIOD Weddings parties and gettogethers almost always involve drinking PERIOD

The licensing process for Uber was streamlined in Montana by a bill that took effect this May though the company hasnt started operations in the state yet PERIOD

An Uber ride around  miles from Coeur DAlene Idaho the nearest city to Missoula with the service would cost anywhere from  to  depending on the vehicle chosen according to Ubers fare estimator PERIOD

Traveling the same distance from Missoula using Green Taxi a local taxi service in the Missoula area would cost about  according to their website PERIOD Green Taxi will also travel north to Condon west to Frenchtown and south to Lolo PERIOD

The average age of a drunk driver involved in a fatal wreck is between  and  years old though  percent of wrecks involved  to 24yearolds who only make up eight percent of licensed drivers in the U.S PERIOD

Despite the documented danger speed limits on many sections of Montana interstates rose from  mph to  mph last Thursday after a bill sponsored by Sen PERIOD Scott Sales Bozeman R was passed into law PERIOD

Sales said the Montana Highway Patrol and Department of Transportation both supported the bill and presented research finding that accidents went down when the speed limit was raised on interstates in neighboring states such as North and South Dakota and Wyoming PERIOD

The speed limit didnt go up in every part of the interstate after MDT found some sections were too dangerous to drive at a higher speed Sales said PERIOD Drunk drivers he added wont care how fast theyre going anyway PERIOD

If someones drunk on the highway theyre a hazard at any speed Sales said PERIOD
